content.query:
truncate table temp.cigam_gts_bi_clientes 

INSERT INTO temp.cigam_gts_bi_clientes
select 
concat(ESTAB_IDCIGAM,CLIENTE_CODIGO) as PK_CLIENTE
,ESTAB_IDCIGAM
,CLIENTE_CODIGO
,CLIENTE_NOME
,1 AS FLAG_VIGENCIA
,GETDATE() AS DAT_INICIO_VIGENCIA
,NULL AS DAT_FINAL_VIGENCIA
from cleasing_data.gst_bi_clientes
